GS41surysidu:2: 1.02a: alpāvaśiṣṭe tu kṛte *mayo nāma mahāsuraH/(B mayanāma)
GS41surysidu:3: 1.02b: rahasyaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ jijñāsur jñānam uttamam//
GS41surysidu:6: 1.04a: toṣitas tapasā tena prītas tasmai varārthine/
GS41surysidu:7: 1.04b: grahāṇāṃ caritaṃ prādān mayāya savitā svayam//
GS41surysidu:8: 1.05a: viditas te *mayā bhāvas toṣitas tapasā hy aham/ (ḍ mayābhāvas)
GS41surysidu:9: 1.05b: dadyāṃ kālāśrayaṃ jñānaṃ grahāṇāṃ caritaṃ mahat//
GS41surysidu:10: 1.06a: na me tejaHsahaH kaścid ākhyātuṃ nāsti me kṣaṇaH/
GS41surysidu:13: 1.07b: sa pumān mayam āhedaṃ praṇataṃ prāñjalisthitam//
GS41surysidu:14: 1.08a: śṛṇuṣvaikamanāH pūrvaṃ yad uktaṃ jñānam uttamam/
GS41surysidu:15: 1.08b: yuge yuge maharṣīṇāṃ svayam eva vivasvatā//
GS41surysidu:16: 1.09a: śāstram ādyaṃ tad evedaṃ yat pūrvaṃ prāha bhāskaraH/
GS41surysidu:19: 1.10b: sa dvidhā sthūlasūkṣmatvān mūrtaś cāmūrta ucyate//
GS41surysidu:21: 1.11b: ṣaḍbhiH prāṇair vināḍī syāt tatṣaṣṭyā nāḍikā smṛtā//
GS41surysidu:24: 1.13a: aindavas tithibhis tadvat saṃkrāntyā saura ucyate/
GS41surysidu:25: 1.13b: māsair dvādaśabhir varṣaṃ divyaṃ tad aha ucyate//
GS41surysidu:27: 1.14b: tatṣaṣṭiH ṣaḍguṇā divyaṃ varṣam āsuram eva ca//
GS41surysidu:37: 1.19a: sasandhayas te manavaH kalpe jñeyās caturdaśa/
GS41surysidu:40: 1.20b: kalpo brāhmam ahaH proktaṃ śarvarī tasya tāvatī//
GS41surysidu:43: 1.22a: kalpād asmāc ca manavaH ṣaḍ vyatītāH sasandhayaH/
GS41surysidu:44: 1.22b: vaivasvatasya ca *manor yugānāṃ trighano gataH//(B manoyugānāṃ)
GS41surysidu:45: 1.23a: aṣṭāviṃśād yugād asmād yātam etat kṛtaṃ yugam/
GS41surysidu:46: 1.23b: ataH kālaṃ prasaṃkhyāya saṃkhyām ekatra piṇḍayet//
GS41surysidu:50: 1.25b: jīyamānās tu lambante tulyam eva svamārgagāH//
GS41surysidu:51: 1.26a: prāggatitvam atas teṣāṃ bhagaṇaiH pratyahaṃ gatiH/
GS41surysidu:54: 1.27b: teṣāṃ tu parivartena pauṣṇānte bhagaṇaH smṛtaH//
GS41surysidu:55: 1.28a: vikalānāṃ kalā ṣaṣṭyā tatṣaṣṭyā bhāga ucyate/
GS41surysidu:56: 1.28b: tattriṃśatā bhaved rāśir bhagaṇo dvādaśaiva te//
GS41surysidu:68: 1.34b: bhodayā bhagaṇaiH svaiH svair ūnāH svasvodayā yuge//
GS41surysidu:70: 1.35b: ravimāsonitās te tu śeṣāH syur adhimāsakāH//
GS41surysidu:86: 1.43b: kṛtādricandrā jaivasya trikhāṅkāś ca tathā bhṛgos //(ḍ bhṛgos
GS41surysidu:89: 1.45a: ṣaṇmanūnāṃ tu sampīḍya kālaṃ tatsandhibhiH saha/
GS41surysidu:91: 1.46a: yugānām trighanaṃ yātaṃ tathā kṛtayugaṃ tv idam/
GS41surysidu:92: 1.46b: projjhya sṛṣṭes tataH kālaṃ pūrvoktaṃ divyasaṃkhyayā//
GS41surysidu:109: 1.55b: rāśibhiH sahitāH śuddhāH ṣaṣṭyā syur vijayādayaH//
GS41surysidu:113: 1.57b: *vinā tu pātamandoccān meṣādau tulyatām itāH (ḍ vinendu)//
GS41surysidu:115: 1.58b: niraṃśatvam gatāś cānye noktās te mandacāriṇaH//
GS41surysidu:116: 1.59a: yojanāni śatāny aṣṭau bhūkarṇo dviguṇāni tu/
GS41surysidu:120: 1.61a: kalādi tat phalaṃ prācyāṃ grahebhyaH pariśodhayet/
GS41surysidu:123: 1.62b: rohītakam avantī ca yathā sannihitaṃ saraH//
GS41surysidu:124: 1.63a: atītyonmīlanād indoH paścāt tadgaṇitāgatāt/(C atītyonmīlanād indor dṛkṣiddhir gaṇitāgatāt/)
GS41surysidu:125: 1.63b: yadā bhavet tadā prācyāṃ svasthānaṃ madhyato bhavet//
GS41surysidu:126: 1.64a: aprāpya ca bhavet paścād evaṃ vāpi nimīlanāt/
GS41surysidu:128: 1.65a: ṣaṣṭyā vibhajya labdhais tu yojanaiH prāg athāparaiH/
GS41surysidu:129: 1.65b: svadeśaH paridhau jñeyaH kuryād deśāntaraṃ hi taiH//
GS41surysidu:133: 1.67b: gate śodhyaṃ yutaṃ gamye kṛtvā tātkāliko bhavet//
GS41surysidu:145: 2.03a: pravahākhyo marut tāṃs tu svoccābhimukham īrayet/
GS41surysidu:150: 2.05a: svoccāpakṛṣṭā *bhagaṇaiH prāṅmukhaṃ yānti yad grahāH/ (C bhagaṇāt)
GS41surysidu:151: 2.05b: tat teṣu dhanam ity uktam ṛṇaṃ paścānmukheṣu *ca// (tu)
GS41surysidu:164: 2.11a: ato dhanarṇaṃ sumahat teṣāṃ gativaśād bhavet/
GS41surysidu:165: 2.11b: ākṛṣyamāṇās tair evaṃ vyomni yānty anilāhatāH//
GS41surysidu:167: 2.12b: tathā śīghratarā śīghrā grahāṇām aṣṭadhā gatiH//
GS41surysidu:169: 2.13b: ṛjvīti pañcadhā jñeyā *yā vakrā sātivakragā//(C +anyā vakrādikā
GS41surysidu:201: 2.28b: tadguṇā jyā trijīvāptā taccāpaṃ krāntir ucyate//(C iṣyate)
GS41surysidu:202: 2.29a: grahaṃ saṃśodhya mandoccāt tathā śīghrād viśodhya ca/
GS41surysidu:203: 2.29b: śeṣaṃ kendrapadaṃ tasmād bhujajyā koṭir eva ca//(C kendraṃ padaṃ)
GS41surysidu:204: 2.30a: gatād bhujajyā viṣame gamyāt koṭiH pade bhavet/
GS41surysidu:205: 2.30b: *yugme tu gamyād bāhujyā koṭijyā tu gatād bhavet//(C same)
GS41surysidu:206: 2.31a: liptās tattvayamair bhaktā *labdhaṃ jyāpiṇḍikaṃ gatām/(C labdhā jyāpiṇḍikā gatāH)
GS41surysidu:209: 2.32b: syāt kramajyāvidhir ayaṃ utkramajyāsv api smṛtaH//
GS41surysidu:216: 2.35b: oje dvyagā vasuyamā radā rudrā gajābdayaH//
GS41surysidu:222: 2.38b: *yugme vṛtte dhanarṇaṃ syād ojād ūnādhike sphuṭam// (C yugmavṛtte)
GS41surysidu:225: 2.40a: *śaighryaṃ koṭiphalaṃ kendre makarādau dhanaṃ smṛtam/(C śaighre)
GS41surysidu:226: 2.40b: saṃśodhyaṃ tu *trijīvāyāṃ karkyādau koṭijaṃ phalam//(C trijīvātaH)
GS41surysidu:229: 2.42a: labdhasya cāpaṃ liptādiphalaṃ *śaighryam idaṃ smṛtam/ (C śaighram)
GS41surysidu:230: 2.42b: etad ādye kujādīnāṃ caturthe caiva karmaṇi//
GS41surysidu:232: 2.43b: *śaighryaṃ māndaṃ punar māndaṃ śaighryaṃ catvāry anukramāt//(C
GS41surysidu:235: 2.44b: madhyagrahe *mandaphalaṃ sakalaṃ śaighryam eva ca//(C punar māndaṃ)
GS41surysidu:236: 2.45a: ajādikendre sarveṣāṃ *śaighrye mānde ca karmaṇi/(C mānde śaighre)
GS41surysidu:237: 2.45b: dhanaṃ grahāṇāṃ liptādi tulādāv rṇam eva ca//
GS41surysidu:245: 2.49b: karkyādau tu dhanaṃ tatra makarādāv ṛṇaṃ smṛtam//
GS41surysidu:249: 2.51b: ṛṇam ūne +adhike projjhya śeṣaṃ vakragatir bhavet//
GS41surysidu:254: 2.54a: bhavanti vakriṇas tais tu svaiH svaiś cakrād viśodhitaiH/
GS41surysidu:279: 2.66b: gatā gamyāś ca ṣaṣṭighnyo nāḍyo bhuktyantaroddhṛtāH//
GS41surysidu:280: 2.67a: dhruvāṇi śakunir nāgaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu catuṣpadam/
GS41surysidu:287: 3.01b: tatra śaṅkvaṅgulair iṣṭaiH samaṃ maṇḍalam ālikhet//
GS41surysidu:293: 3.04b: diṅmadhyamatsyaiH saṃsādhyā vidiśas tadvad eva hi//
GS41surysidu:294: 3.05a: caturasraṃ bahiH kuryāt sūtrair madhyād vinirgataiH/
GS41surysidu:301: 3.08b: projjhya śaṅkukṛtiṃ mūlaṃ chāyā śaṅkur viparyayāt//
GS41surysidu:302: 3.09a: triṃśatkṛtyo yuge bhānāṃ cakraṃ prāk parilambate/
GS41surysidu:303: 3.09b: tadguṇād bhūdinair bhaktād dyugaṇād yad avāpyate//
GS41surysidu:307: 3.11b: prāk cakraṃ calitaṃ hīne chāyārkāt karaṇāgate//
GS41surysidu:309: 3.12b: evaṃ viṣuvatī chāyā svadeśe yā dinārdhajā//
GS41surysidu:312: 3.14a: lambākṣajye tayoś cāpe lambākṣau dakṣiṇau sadā/
GS41surysidu:314: 3.15a: svakarṇāptā dhanurliptā natās tā dakṣiṇe bhuje/
GS41surysidu:317: 3.16b: tābhyo +akṣajyā ca tadvargaṃ projjhya trijyākṛteH padam//
GS41surysidu:320: 3.18a: digbhede +apakramaH śeṣas tasya jyā trijyayā hatā/
GS41surysidu:323: 3.19b: mṛgādau projjhya bhagaṇān madhyāhne +arkaH sphuṭo bhavet//
GS41surysidu:324: 3.20a: tanmāndam asakṛd vāmaṃ phalaṃ madhyo divākaraH/
GS41surysidu:326: 3.21a: śeṣaṃ natāṃśāH sūryasya tadbāhujyā ca koṭijyā/
GS41surysidu:334: 3.25a: mādhyāhniko bhujo nityaṃ chāyā mādhyāhnikī smṛtā/
GS41surysidu:336: 3.26a: krāntijyāpte tu tau karṇau samamaṇḍalage ravau/
GS41surysidu:337: 3.26b: saumyākṣonā yadā kāntiH syāt tadā dyudalaśravaH//
GS41surysidu:342: 3.29a: punar dvādaśanighnāc ca labhyate yat phalaṃ budhaiH/
GS41surysidu:344: 3.30a: tadeva karaṇī nāma tāṃ pṛthak sthāpayed budhaH/
GS41surysidu:348: 3.32a: yāmyayor vidiśoH śaṅkur evaṃ yāmyottare ravau/
GS41surysidu:349: 3.32b: paribhramati śaṅkos tu śaṅkur uttarayos tu saH//
GS41surysidu:357: 3.36b: trijyāvargāt padaṃ dṛgjyā chāyākarṇau tu pūrvavat//
GS41surysidu:359: 3.37b: dṛgjyā tadvargasaṃśuddhāt trijyāvargāc ca yat padam/
GS41surysidu:362: 3.39a: unnatajyā tayā hīnā svāntyā śeṣasya kārmukam/
GS41surysidu:366: 3.41a: taccāpaṃ bhādikaṃ kṣetraṃ padais tatra bhavo raviH/
GS41surysidu:374: 3.45a: vyastā vyastair yutāH svaiH svaiH karkaṭādyās tatas trayaH/
GS41surysidu:381: 3.48b: bhāgair yuktaṃ ca hīnaṃ ca tallagnaṃ kṣitije tadā// (C bhāgahīnaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca)
GS41surysidu:383: 3.49b: bhānau kṣayadhane kṛtvā madhyalagnaṃ tadā bhavet//
GS41surysidu:386: 3.51a: sūryād ūne niśāśeṣe lagne +arkād adhike divā/
GS41surysidu:398: 4.05b: viśodhya labdhaṃ sūcyāṃ tu tamo liptās tu pūrvavat//
GS41surysidu:406: 4.09b: bhūcchāyāṃ prāṅmukhaś candro viśaty asya bhaved asau//
GS41surysidu:408: 4.10b: yogārdhāt projjhya yaccheṣaṃ tāvac channaṃ tad ucyate//
GS41surysidu:409: 4.11a: yad grāhyam adhike tasmin sakalaṃ nyūnam anyathā/
GS41surysidu:410: 4.11b: yogārdhād adhike na syād vikṣepe grāsasambhavaH//
GS41surysidu:416: 4.14b: liptādi pragrahe śodhyaṃ mokṣe deyaṃ punaH punaH//
GS41surysidu:427: 4.20a: kṣepo bhujas tayor vargayuter mūlaṃ śravas tu tat/
GS41surysidu:430: 4.21b: sthityardhān maukṣikāc cheṣaṃ prāgvac ccheṣaṃ tu maukṣike//
GS41surysidu:440: 4.26b: chindyād vikṣepamānāni tāny eṣām aṅgulāni tu//
GS41surysidu:459: 5.09b: dhanam ūne +asakṛt karma yāvat sarvaṃ sthirībhavet//
GS41surysidu:471: 5.15b: maukṣikaṃ lambanaṃ hīnaṃ paścārdhe tu viparyayaH//
GS41surysidu:475: 5.17b: sve sve sthitidale yojyā vimardārdhe +api coktavat//
GS41surysidu:477: 6.01a: na chedyakam ṛte yasmād bhedā grahaṇayoH sphuṭāH/
GS41surysidu:479: 6.02a: susādhitāyām avanau binduṃ kṛtvā tato likhet/
GS41surysidu:484: 6.04b: prāg indor grahaṇaṃ paścān mokṣo +arkasya viparyayāt//
GS41surysidu:486: 6.05b: maukṣikaṃ tu viparyastaṃ viparītam idaṃ raveH//
GS41surysidu:487: 6.06a: valanāgrān nayen madhyaṃ sūtraṃ yady atra saṃspṛśet/
GS41surysidu:494: 6.09b: bhede paścān mukhaṃ deyam indor bhānor viparyayāt//
GS41surysidu:497: 6.11a: vikṣepāgrāl likhed vṛttaṃ grāhakārdhena tena yat/
GS41surysidu:499: 6.12a: chedyakaṃ likhatā bhūmau phalake vā vipaścitā/
GS41surysidu:502: 6.13b: liptātrayam api grastaṃ tīkṣṇatvān na vivasvataH//
GS41surysidu:506: 6.15b: prasārya sūtradvitayaṃ tayor yatra yutir bhavet//
GS41surysidu:513: 6.19a: spṛśed yatra tato vṛttaṃ grāhakārdhena saṃlikhet/
GS41surysidu:514: 6.19b: tena grāhyaṃ yadākrāntaṃ tat tamograstam ādiśet//
GS41surysidu:516: 6.20b: nimīlanākhyāṃ dadyāt sā tanmārge yatra saṃspṛśet//
GS41surysidu:521: 6.23a: ardhād ūne sadhūṃraṃ syāt kṛṣṇam ardhādhikaṃ bhavet/
GS41surysidu:523: 6.24a: rahasyam etad devānāṃ na deyaṃ yasya kasyacit/
GS41surysidu:529: 7.02b: dvayoH prāgyāyinor evaṃ vakriṇos tu viparyayāt//
GS41surysidu:534: 7.05a: labdhaṃ liptādikaṃ śodhyaṃ gate deyaṃ bhaviṣyati/
GS41surysidu:542: 7.09a: labdhaṃ prācyām ṛṇaṃ saumyād vikṣepāt paścime dhanam/
GS41surysidu:543: 7.09b: dakṣiṇe prākkapāle svaṃ paścime tu tathā kṣamaH//
GS41surysidu:547: 7.11b: śṛṅgonnatau tu candrasya dṛkkarmādāv idaṃ smṛtam//
GS41surysidu:548: 7.12a: tātkālikau punaH kāryau vikṣepau ca tayos tataH/
GS41surysidu:549: 7.12b: diktulye tv antaraṃ bhede yogaH śiṣṭaṃ grahāntaram//
GS41surysidu:552: 7.14a: tricatuH karṇayutyāptās te dvighnās trijyayā hatāH/
GS41surysidu:563: 7.19b: aṃśād ūne +apasavyākhyaṃ yuddham eko +atra ced aṇuh//
GS41surysidu:567: 7.21b: udakṣtho dīptimān sthūlo jayī yāmye +api yo balī//
GS41surysidu:568: 7.22a: āsannāv apy ubhau dīptau bhavataś cet samāgamaH/
GS41surysidu:569: 7.22b: svalpau dvāv api vidhvastau bhavetāṃ kūṭavigrahau//
GS41surysidu:570: 7.23a: udakṣtho dakṣiṇastho vā bhārgavaH prāyaśo jayī/
GS41surysidu:573: 7.24b: svamārgagāH prayānty ete dūram anyonyam āśritāH//
GS41surysidu:583: 8.05a: tricatuH pādayoH sandhau śraviṣṭhā śravaṇasya tu/
GS41surysidu:585: 8.06a: randhrādrayaH kramād eṣāṃ vikṣepāH svād apakramāt/
GS41surysidu:586: 8.06b: diṅmāsaviṣayāH saumye yāmye pañca diśo nava//
GS41surysidu:587: 8.07a: saumye rasāH khaṃ yāmye +agāH saumye khārkās trayodaśa/
GS41surysidu:590: 8.08b: uttarasyāṃ tathā ṣaṣṭis triṃśat ṣaṭtriṃśad eva hi//
GS41surysidu:591: 8.09a: dakṣiṇe tv ardhabhāgas tu caturviṃśatir uttare/
GS41surysidu:592: 8.09b: bhāgāH ṣaḍviṃśatiH khaṃ ca dāsrādīnāṃ yathākramam//
GS41surysidu:595: 8.11a: vikṣepo dakṣiṇe bhāgaiH khārṇavaiH svād apakramāt/
GS41surysidu:597: 8.12a: aṣṭābhis triṃśatā caiva vikṣiptāv uttareṇa tau/
GS41surysidu:598: 8.12b: golaṃ labdhvā parīkṣeta vikṣepaṃ dhruvakaṃ sphuṭam//
GS41surysidu:600: 8.13b: vikṣepo +abhyadhiko bhindyād rohiṇyāH śakataṃ tu saH//
GS41surysidu:601: 8.14a: grahavad dyuniśe bhānāṃ kuryād dṛkkarma pūrvavat/
GS41surysidu:603: 8.15a: eṣyo hīne gṛhe yogo dhruvakād adhike tataH/
GS41surysidu:608: 8.17b: hastasya yogatārā sā śraviṣṭhāyāś ca paścimā//
GS41surysidu:615: 8.21a: apāṃvatsas tu citrāyā uttare +aṃśais tu pañcabhiH/
GS41surysidu:616: 8.21b: bṛhat kiñcid ato bhāgair āpaH ṣaḍbhis tathottare//
GS41surysidu:621: 9.02b: ūnāH prāgudayaṃ yānti śukrajñau vakriṇau tathā//
GS41surysidu:625: 9.04b: divā cārkagrahau kuryād dṛkkarmātha grahasya tu//
GS41surysidu:631: 9.07b: prāg astam udayaH paścād alpatvād daśabhir bhṛgoH//
GS41surysidu:650: 9.17a: prāg eṣām udayaH paścād asto dṛkkarma pūrvavat/
GS41surysidu:656: 10.01b: bhāgair dvādaśabhiH paścād dṛśyaH prāg yāty adṛśyatām//
GS41surysidu:664: 10.05b: taiH prāṇaiH kṛṣṇapakṣe tu śītāṃśur udayaṃ vrajet//
GS41surysidu:669: 10.08a: śeṣaṃ lambajyayā bhaktaṃ labdho bāhuH svadiṅmukhaH/
GS41surysidu:670: 10.08b: koṭiH śaṅkus tayor vargayuter mūlaṃ śrutir bhavet//
GS41surysidu:674: 10.10b: tataH paścān mukhī koṭiṃ karṇaṃ koṭyagramadhyagam//
GS41surysidu:680: 10.13b: prāgbimbaṃ yādṛg eva syāt tādṛk tatra dine śaśī//
GS41surysidu:681: 10.14a: koṭyā dik sādhanāt tiryakṣūtrānte śṛṅgam unnatam/
GS41surysidu:682: 10.14b: darśayed unnatāṃ koṭiṃ kṛtvā candrasya sākṛtiH//
GS41surysidu:684: 10.15b: dadyād vāmaṃ bhujaṃ tatra paścimaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vidhoH//
GS41surysidu:689: 11.02b: samās tadā vyatīpāto bhagaṇārdhe tayor yutau//
GS41surysidu:699: 11.07b: yadi syād adhikā bhānoH krānteH pāto gatas tadā//
GS41surysidu:700: 11.08a: ūnā cet syāt tadā bhāvī vāmaṃ yugmapadasya ca/
GS41surysidu:703: 11.09b: taccāpāntaram ardhaṃ vā yojyaṃ bhāvini śītagau//
GS41surysidu:705: 11.10b: candrabhuktyā hṛtaṃ bhānau liptādi śaśivat phalam//
GS41surysidu:707: 11.11b: karmaitad asakṛt tāvad yāvad krāntī same tayoH//
GS41surysidu:723: 11.19b: dvir bhaved dhi tadā pātaH syād abhāvo viparyayāt//
GS41surysidu:730: 11.23a: ity etat paramaṃ puṇyaṃ jyotiṣāṃ caritaṃ hitam/
GS41surysidu:731: 11.23b: rhasyaṃ mahad ākhyātaṃ kim anyacchrotum icchasi//
GS41surysidu:735: 12.02a: bhagavan kimpramāṇā bhūH kim ākārā kim āśrayā/
GS41surysidu:740: 12.04b: kim atha tat kathaṃ vā syād bhānor bhagaṇapūraṇāt//
GS41surysidu:741: 12.05a: pitryaṃ māsena bhavati nāḍīṣaṣṭyā tu mānuṣam/
GS41surysidu:742: 12.05b: tad eva kila sarvatra na bhavet kena hetunā//
GS41surysidu:744: 12.06b: kathaṃ paryeti bhagaṇaH sagraho +ayaṃ kim āśrayaH//
GS41surysidu:745: 12.07a: bhūmer uparyuparyūrdhvāH kim utsedhāH kim antarāH/
GS41surysidu:746: 12.07b: graharkṣakakṣāH kiṃmātrāH sthitāH kena krameṇa tāH//
GS41surysidu:747: 12.08a: grīṣme tīvrakaro bhānur na hemante tathāvidhaH/
GS41surysidu:748: 12.08b: kiyatī tatkaraprāptir mānāni kati kiṃ ca taiH//
GS41surysidu:749: 12.09a: evaṃ me saṃśayaṃ chindhi bhagavan bhūtabhāvana/
GS41surysidu:750: 12.09b: anyo na tvām ṛte chettā vidyate sarvadarśivān//
GS41surysidu:751: 12.10a: iti bhaktyoditaṃ śrutvā mayoktaṃ vākyam asya hi/
GS41surysidu:752: 12.10b: rahasyaṃ param adhyāyaṃ tataH prāha punaH sa tam//
GS41surysidu:755: 12.12a: vāsudevaH paraṃ brahma tanmūrtiH puruṣaH paraH/
GS41surysidu:757: 12.13a: prakṛtyantargato devo bahir antaś ca sarvagaH/
GS41surysidu:762: 12.15b: ādityo hy ādibhūtatvāt prasūtyā sūrya ucyate//
GS41surysidu:763: 12.16a: paraṃ jyotis tamaH pāre sūryo +ayaṃ saviteti ca/
GS41surysidu:765: 12.17a: prakāśātmā tamohantā mahān ity eṣa viśrutaH/
GS41surysidu:768: 12.18b: sarvātmā sarvagaH sūkṣmaH sarvam asmin pratiṣṭhitam//
GS41surysidu:770: 12.19b: chandāṃsy aśvāH sapta yuktāH paryaṭaty eṣa sarvadā//
GS41surysidu:776: 12.22b: manasaś candramā jajñe sūryo +akṣṇos tejasāṃ nidhiH//
GS41surysidu:777: 12.23a: manasaH khaṃ tato vāyur agnir āpo dharā kramāt/
GS41surysidu:792: 12.30b: tanmadhye bhramaṇaṃ bhānām adho +adhaH kramaśas tathā//
GS41surysidu:795: 12.32a: madhye samantād aṇḍasya bhūgolo vyomni tiṣṭhati/
GS41surysidu:801: 12.35a: upariṣṭāt sthitās tasya sendrā devā maharṣayaH/
GS41surysidu:809: 12.39a: yāmyāyāṃ bhārate varṣe laṅkā tadvan mahāpurī/
GS41surysidu:814: 12.41b: tābhyaś cottarago merus tāvān eva surāśrayaH//
GS41surysidu:817: 12.43a: meror ubhayato madhye dhruvatāre nabhaH sthite/
GS41surysidu:827: 12.48a: meṣādāv uditaH sūryas trīn rāśīn udaguttaram/
GS41surysidu:829: 12.49a: *karkyādīn sañcaraṃś tadvad ahnaH paścārdham eva saH/(C karkādīn)
GS41surysidu:830: 12.49b: tulādīṃs trīn mṛgādīṃś ca tadvad eva suradviṣām//
GS41surysidu:831: 12.50a: ato dinakṣape teṣām anyonyaṃ hi viparyayāt/
GS41surysidu:838: 12.53b: manyante khe yato golas tasya kvordhavaṃ kva vādhaH//
GS41surysidu:840: 12.54b: paśyanti vṛttām apy etāṃ cakrākārāṃ vasundharām//
GS41surysidu:842: 12.55b: upariṣṭād bhagolo +ayaṃ vyakṣe paścān mukhaH sadā//
GS41surysidu:843: 12.56a: atas tatra dinaṃ triṃśannāḍikaṃ śarvadī tathā/
GS41surysidu:847: 12.58a: tulādau dyuniśor vāmaṃ kṣayavṛddhī tayor ubhe/
GS41surysidu:852: 12.60b: bhūvṛttapādāc cheṣāṇi yāni syur yojanāni taiH//
GS41surysidu:854: 12.61b: nāḍīṣaṣṭyā sakṛd aharniśāpy asmin sakṛt tathā//
GS41surysidu:858: 12.63b: dhanur mṛgasthaH savitā devabhāge na dṛśyate//
GS41surysidu:859: 12.64a: tathā cāsurabhāge tu mithune karkaṭe sthitaH/
GS41surysidu:866: 12.67b: sakṛd evoditaṃ tadvad asurāś ca tulādigam//
GS41surysidu:872: 12.70b: rātryardhaṃ ketumāle tu kurāv astamayaṃ tadā//
GS41surysidu:879: 12.74a: sakṛd udgatam abdārdhaṃ paśyanty arkaṃ surāsurāH/
GS41surysidu:880: 12.74b: pitaraH śaśigāH pakṣaṃ svadinaṃ ca narā bhuvi//
GS41surysidu:884: 12.76b: grahaH kālena mahatā maṇḍale mahati bhraman//
GS41surysidu:886: 12.77b: mahatyā kakṣayā gacchan tataH svalpaṃ śanaiścaraH//
GS41surysidu:887: 12.78a: mandād adhaH krameṇa syuś caturthā divasādhipāH/
GS41surysidu:894: 12.81b: ākāśakakṣā sā jñeyā karavyāptis tathā raveH//
GS41surysidu:898: 12.83b: svakakṣāptā tu sā tasya tithyāptā gatiliptikā//
GS41surysidu:914: 13.01a: atha gupte śucau deśe snātaH śucir alaṅkṛtaH/
GS41surysidu:915: 13.01b: sampūjya bhāskaraṃ bhaktyā grahān bhāny atha guhyakān//
GS41surysidu:922: 13.05a: bhagaṇāṃśāṅgulaiH kāryā dalitais tisra eva tāH/
GS41surysidu:925: 13.06b: svaiH svair apakramais tisro meṣādīnām apakramāt//
GS41surysidu:926: 13.07a: kakṣāH prakalpayet tāś ca karkyādīnāṃ viparyayāt/
GS41surysidu:931: 13.09b: madhye vaiṣuvatī kakṣā sarveṣām eva saṃsthitā//
GS41surysidu:935: 13.11b: ayanād ayanaṃ caiva kakṣā tiryak tathāparā//
GS41surysidu:936: 13.12a: krāntisañjñā tayā sūryaH sadā paryeti bhāsayan/
GS41surysidu:937: 13.12b: candrādyāś ca svakaiH pātair apamaṇḍalam āśritaiH//
GS41surysidu:939: 13.13b: udayakṣitije lagnam astaṃ gacchac ca tadvaśāt//
GS41surysidu:947: 13.17b: gopyam etat prakāśoktaṃ sarvagamyaṃ bhaved iha//
GS41surysidu:950: 13.19a: prasādāt kasyacid bhūyaH prādur bhavati kāmataH/
GS41surysidu:958: 13.22b: bījāni pāṃsavas teṣu prayogās te +api durlabhāH//
GS41surysidu:960: 13.23b: ṣaṣṭir majjaty ahorātre sphuṭaṃ yantraṃ kapālakam//
GS41surysidu:961: 13.24a: narayantraṃ tathā sādhu divā ca vimale ravau/
GS41surysidu:966: 14.01a: brāhmaṃ divyaṃ tathā pitryaṃ prājāpatyaṃ guros tathā/
GS41surysidu:967: 14.01b: sauraṃ ca sāvanaṃ cāndram ārkṣaṃ mānāni vai nava//
GS41surysidu:969: 14.02b: bārhaspatyena ṣaṣṭyabdaṃ jñeyaṃ nānyais tu nityaśaH//
GS41surysidu:974: 14.05a: ṣaḍviṃśe dhanuṣo bhāge dvāviṃśe nimiṣasya ca/
GS41surysidu:976: 14.06a: tataH śeṣāṇi kanyāyā yāny ahāni tu ṣoḍaśa/
GS41surysidu:977: 14.06b: kratubhis tāni tulyāni pitṝṇāṃ dattam akṣayam//
GS41surysidu:979: 14.07b: ayanadvitayaṃ caiva catasraH prathitās tu tāH//
GS41surysidu:983: 14.09b: karkyādes tu tathaiva syāt ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam//
GS41surysidu:985: 14.10b: meṣādayo dvādaśaite māsās tair eva vatsaraH//
GS41surysidu:987: 14.11b: tadardhanāḍyaH saṅkrānter arvāk puṇyaṃ tathā pare//
GS41surysidu:988: 14.12a: arkād viniHsṛtaH prācīṃ yad yāty aharahaH śaśī/
GS41surysidu:989: 14.12b: tac cāndramānam aṃśais tu jñeyā dvādaśabhis tithiH//
GS41surysidu:990: 14.13a: tithiH karaṇam udvāhaH kṣauraṃ sarvakriyās tathā/
GS41surysidu:992: 14.14a: triṃśatā tithibhir māsaś cāndraH pitryam ahaH smṛtam/
GS41surysidu:993: 14.14b: niśā ca māsapakṣāntau tayor madhye vibhāgataH//
GS41surysidu:997: 14.16b: antyopāntyau pañcamaś ca tridhā māsatrayaṃ smṛtam//
GS41surysidu:998: 14.17a: vaiśākhādiṣu kṛṣṇe ca yogaH pañcadaśe tithau/
GS41surysidu:1000: 14.18a: udayād udayaṃ bhānoH sāvanaṃ tat prakīrtitam/
GS41surysidu:1001: 14.18b: sāvanāni syur *etena yajñakālavidhis tu taiH//(ḍ etana)
GS41surysidu:1005: 14.20b: yatproktaṃ tad bhaved divyaṃ bhānor bhagaṇapūraṇāt//
GS41surysidu:1007: 14.21b: na tatra dyuniśor bhedo brāhmaṃ kalpaH prakīrtitam//
GS41surysidu:1010: 14.23a: divyaṃ cārkṣaṃ grahāṇāṃ ca darśitaṃ jñānam uttamam/
GS41surysidu:1012: 14.24a: ity uktvā mayam āmantrya samyak tenābhipūjitaH/
GS41surysidu:1014: 14.25a: mayo +atha divyaṃ tajñānaṃ jñātvā sākṣād vivasvataH/
GS41surysidu:1016: 14.26a: jñātvā tam ṛṣayaś cātha sūryalabdhavaraṃ mayam/
GS41surysidu:1018: 14.27a: sa tebhyaH pradadau prīto grahāṇāṃ caritaṃ mahat/
